channel.title: PerezHilton
channel.description: Since 2004, Hollywood's most sassy website has been delivering the juiciest celebrity gossip. The blog is The go-to source for daily happenings in Hollywood. Written by the internet's most notorious gossip columnist, Perez Hilton (Mario Lavandeira).

item.title: Once In A Blue Moon! Beck Performs On Saturday Night Live & Brings A Friend!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Sweet, sweet music! It’s been nearly a decade since Beck performed on Saturday Night Live, but he finally made his way there this weekend! For his first performance, the singer brought out Father John Misty to play Blue Moon with him (above), and then they moved on to his next song Wave (below). Both tunes have different [...]
item.content:encoded:
Sweet, sweet music!

It’s been nearly a decade since Beck performed on Saturday Night Live, but he finally made his way there this weekend!

For his first performance, the singer brought out Father John Misty to play Blue Moon with him (above), and then they moved on to his next song Wave (below).

Both tunes have different feels to them, but are equally as good!

Ch-ch-check them out and tell us which you like best!

item.title: Beyoncé Is Snatchin’ Wigs At Her Concert! See Her HIGHlarious Response To The Hair Throwing Fan!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: The Beyhive loves their queen! They love her so much that people will literally give their hair for her to notice them, and that’s what happened! While Beyoncé was performing XO at her concert, she was walking through the crowd, and someone threw their wig at her! And ‘Yonce’s response was flawless! Click ‘Play’ (below) if you want the [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Beyhive loves their queen!

They love her so much that people will literally give their hair for her to notice them, and that’s what happened!

While Beyoncé was performing XO at her concert, she was walking through the crowd, and someone threw their wig at her!

And ‘Yonce’s response was flawless!

Click ‘Play’ (below) if you want the Queen to give you your daily laugh!

So silly! People seem to be torn on whether or not Bey said “wigs” or “weaves” but either way, we’re so glad this moment happened!

item.title: The Razzies Crowned The WORST Movie Of The Year! Find Out Just How Bad It Was HERE!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: It’s that time of year again! With the Oscars happening on Sunday, it was time to get the The Golden Raspberry Awards, or Razzies, underway! The awards took place in El Lay at Ignited Spaces, and plenty of people got razzed, including the star-studded Movie 43, which took the prize for Worst Picture! The flick also won [...]
item.content:encoded:
It’s that time of year again!

With the Oscars happening on Sunday, it was time to get the The Golden Raspberry Awards, or Razzies, underway!

The awards took place in El Lay at Ignited Spaces, and plenty of people got razzed, including the star-studded Movie 43, which took the prize for Worst Picture! The flick also won Worst Director, since there were 13 of them, and Worst Screenplay, since there were 19 writers!

Curious about who won the rest of the awardz? Here they are:

WORST ACTRESS - Tyler Perry, A Madea Christmas

WORST ACTOR - Jaden Smith, After Earth

WORST SUPPORTING ACTRESS - Kim Kardashian, Tyler Perry’s Temptation

WORST SUPPORTING ACTOR - Will Smith, After Earth

WORST SCREEN COMBO - Jaden Smith and Will Smith on Planet Nepotism, After Earth

WORST REMAKE, RIP-OFF OR SEQUEL - The Lone Ranger

Thoughts???

[Image via Movie 43.]

item.title: So Boss! Bruce Springsteen Does Lorde! Watch His Royals Cover HERE!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: You know you’re a big deal when The Boss starts performing your songs! Bruce Springsteen was getting ready to start his second live show EVER in New Zealand, but nothing could kick it off quite like this! The legendary singer-songwriter gave a nod to New Zealand native, and fabulous person, Lorde by singing an acoustic version of [...]
item.content:encoded:
You know you’re a big deal when The Boss starts performing your songs!

Bruce Springsteen was getting ready to start his second live show EVER in New Zealand, but nothing could kick it off quite like this!

The legendary singer-songwriter gave a nod to New Zealand native, and fabulous person, Lorde by singing an acoustic version of Royals to get the party started!

But like any true vet, Bruce put his own finishing touches on the tune.

It actually kind of takes on a whole new life of it’s own! Ch-ch-check out the performance (below)!

item.title: Jim Parsons & Johnny Weir Could Be Twins! See The HIGHlarious SNL Sketch HERE!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: After starting off 2014 with a bang, Saturday Night Live took a break for the Winter Olympics, and now they’re back! Jim Parsons was the first host since their return and he did a bazinga of a job! The Big Bang Theory actor participated in the cold open skit, which featured him as Johnny Weir (above)! Actually, [...]
item.content:encoded:
After starting off 2014 with a bang, Saturday Night Live took a break for the Winter Olympics, and now they’re back!

Jim Parsons was the first host since their return and he did a bazinga of a job!

The Big Bang Theory actor participated in the cold open skit, which featured him as Johnny Weir (above)! Actually, maybe Jim should consider shopping with Johnny sometime because he looked fantastic!

Then, the monologue broke out into musical fabulosity! Ch-ch-check it out (below)!

item.title: Listen To All Of The Best Song Nominees That Will Be Performed At The Oscars HERE!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Are you excited for the Oscars? Because we areee! And since we’re excited, we decided to make a pre-show playlist which includes all of the nominees in the Original Song category! Who are the nominees, you ask? Well, we have the songs for you to listen to! You can hit ‘Play’ on Happy by Pharrell Williams, who we’re [...]
item.content:encoded:
Are you excited for the Oscars? Because we areee!

And since we’re excited, we decided to make a pre-show playlist which includes all of the nominees in the Original Song category!

Who are the nominees, you ask? Well, we have the songs for you to listen to!

You can hit ‘Play’ on Happy by Pharrell Williams, who we’re sure will be wearing THAT hat when we see him! Ha!

The other nominees are (below), and after you give them a listen, tell us who YOU think should win!

Let It Go from FROZEN
Music and Lyric by Kristen Anderson-Lopez and Robert Lopez

Ordinary Love from MANDELA: LONG WALK TO FREEDOM
Music by Paul Hewson, Dave Evans, Adam Clayton and Larry Mullen; Lyric by Paul Hewson

The Moon Song from HER
Music by Karen O; Lyric by Karen O and Spike Jonze

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel Greets Toronto Mayor Rob Ford At The Airport… But Why?
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Only in Hollywood… Jimmy Kimmel wasn’t getting ready for the Oscars on Saturday night, instead he was escorting Toronto’s Mayor Rob Ford! No, not THAT kind of escort! Arriving at LAX, the Mayor was greeted by the 46-year-old show host in his porter’s uniform, complete with a hat! But we have to ask… why?! Reportedly, Jimmy asked the famous politician [...]
item.content:encoded:
Only in Hollywood…

Jimmy Kimmel wasn’t getting ready for the Oscars on Saturday night, instead he was escorting Toronto’s Mayor Rob Ford!

No, not THAT kind of escort!

Arriving at LAX, the Mayor was greeted by the 46-year-old show host in his porter’s uniform, complete with a hat!

But we have to ask… why?!

Reportedly, Jimmy asked the famous politician to come on his Monday night show, so maybe this was his grand welcome!

All we know is that tons of celebs are flocking to El Lay right now, but Rob Ford is the one who got the royal celeb treatment! Ha!

[Image via Ramey Pix.]

item.title: Young Hollywood Comes Out To Play During This 1989 Oscars Musical! See All Of Your Current Faves Do Their Thangs!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Back in 1989, there was no Twitter, but there were some incredible actors and actresses who would grow up to have one! Ha! This clip is from the Young Hollywood musical number during the Oscars that year, which was introduced by Lucille Ball and Bob Hope. It’s been too long since we heard that contagious Lucy [...]
item.content:encoded:
Back in 1989, there was no Twitter, but there were some incredible actors and actresses who would grow up to have one! Ha!

This clip is from the Young Hollywood musical number during the Oscars that year, which was introduced by Lucille Ball and Bob Hope. It’s been too long since we heard that contagious Lucy laugh! Sadly, she passed away just around a month after this moment.

But the performance is just phenomenal, with Holly Robinson Peete and Ricki Lake belting it out, and Patrick Dempsey slaying some air monsters!

Some of the other awesome performers are Blair Underwood, Christian Slater, and Corey Feldman.

Loves it!

Ch-ch-check out the old New Hollywood magic (above)!

item.title: Teresa & Joe Giudice May Escape Serious Prison Time! See The Plea Deal They Offered The U.S. Attorney’s Office HERE!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Looks like their long legal battle could be coming to an end… maybe. Real Housewives of New Jersey stars Teresa and Joe Giudice are currently dealing with a 41-count indictment, because of their mail and wire fraud conspiracy, but they may make it out of this without having to do tons of jail time. Actually, Teresa may [...]
item.content:encoded:
Looks like their long legal battle could be coming to an end… maybe.

Real Housewives of New Jersey stars Teresa and Joe Giudice are currently dealing with a 41-count indictment, because of their mail and wire fraud conspiracy, but they may make it out of this without having to do tons of jail time.

Actually, Teresa may not have to do any!

Joe previously took the blame for what happened, but both parties will suffer some kind of punishment in the plea deal they’ve offered the U.S. Attorney’s office.

In this deal, Joe will get locked up for at least five years, and Teresa will stay out of jail, but serve a max of five years probation. In addition, they’ll pay $11 million in restitution.

Sounds kind of short for two people facing 50 years, no?

But these two have kids to think of, so at least having Teresa home allows them to grow up with one of their parents.

Teresa and Joe will hear back on Tuesday whether or not the U.S. Attorney will take their deal.

Thoughts???

[Image via WENN.]
